Nightshift nudges Wing Caliber aside quietly, and hands him a  small remote=
.

" I released a stealth micro hover cam when we first encountered Dark Rp=
dimus.  It was programmed ta fowllow his IFF signature upon deployment.  Th=
e cam is cloaked but it is following him.  Just one of many useful tools a =
Ninjabot doesn't go without.  Here, ya got full interface with the stealth =
cam, and ya got full video feed inta the Ark's mainframe. C'mon, let's get =
inside and see how far that spy cam got."

Tucson slowly lumbers off the sh=
uttle on heavy feet, dragging his long tail behind him.  He now has just en=
ough energy to walk into the Ark.  Rattrap and Straight Shot are fast to sc=
amper over to him.  He looks softly down to his sister with a gentile look =
on his face. Her new form didn't bother him.  

" I knew that would happen =
eventually.  Remind me not to step on you, wouldn't want a foot full of qui=
lls."

The tiny porcupine couldn't help but throw her little paws around he=
r brother's neck, with a heart felt hug, keeping her quills down and retrac=
ted.

" That's for giving it your all, literally. "

He couldn't help but g=
ently rub his snout on her face, in a show of affection.  He then looks for=
 Elita and Nightlight.

I must - see Elita and Nightlight.  Their safety is=
 at risk.  Can - not let Rodimus anywhere near them.  In fact he - must be =
barred from the Ark until further notice.  If he dares to show his face in =
this parameter I will not hesitate to defend the Ark against him.  He is ou=
r enemy now, and no foe is allowed anywhere near our territory."

Perpetual=
ly on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 18, 2011, at 12:17 PM, Super C=
yclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> There was a sigh from WING CALI=
BER as he watched STRAIGHT SHOT and RAT
> TRAP walk towards the medical bay=
. It would be a short while before
> the medical staff returned from their =
trip retrieving SILVERBOLT and
> TUSCON and then another while as they had =
to go back out and get the
> rest of the FUZORS.
> 
> WING CALIBER turned t=
o look at the PADD in his hand as he talked to
> NIGHTSHIFT, "So who got th=
e scan from Dark Rodimus? Is he still
> holding the matrix?" CALIBER's voic=
e had a knowing sound to it as he
> probrably already knew that no one had =
yet. The PADD he was holding
> had the current reports on it.
> 
> He turne=
d to look at the shuttle as it was coming in for a landing the
> bay door a=
lready opening. "Leo Prime I am sure will have a lot to to
> discuss with e=
veryone, as he will probrably want to hear everyone's
> report first hand."=
 WING CALIBER stowed his PADD in subspace as he
> walked towards the shuttl=
e.
> 
> "Perhaps you should take Elita to her chambers?" CALBER said as he
=
> shook his head ruefully. "I believe that this debacle far from over. I
> =
hope Tuscon is ready for it."
> 
> Already SANTON and BUMP could be seen ho=
vering over SILVERBOLT as they
> prepped to bring him in as the feeding tub=
es were retracting from
> TUSCON - He could get more once they got him insi=
de.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>

      <p>There was a sigh from WING CALIBER as he =
watched STRAIGHT SHOT and RAT<br>
TRAP walk towards the medical bay. It wou=
ld be a short while before<br>
the medical staff returned from their trip r=
etrieving SILVERBOLT and<br>
TUSCON and then another while as they had to g=
o back out and get the<br>
rest of the FUZORS.<br>
<br>
WING CALIBER turned=
 to look at the PADD in his hand as he talked to<br>
NIGHTSHIFT, "So who go=
t the scan from Dark Rodimus? Is he still<br>
holding the matrix?" CALIBER'=
s voice had a knowing sound to it as he<br>
probrably already knew that no =
one had yet. The PADD he was holding<br>
had the current reports on it.<br>=

<br>
He turned to look at the shuttle as it was coming in for a landing th=
e<br>
bay door already opening. "Leo Prime I am sure will have a lot to to<=
br>
discuss with everyone, as he will probrably want to hear everyone's<br>=

report first hand." WING CALIBER stowed his PADD in subspace as he<br>
wal=
ked towards the shuttle.<br>
<br>
"Perhaps you should take Elita to her cha=
mbers?" CALBER said as he<br>
shook his head ruefully. "I believe that this=
 debacle far from over. I<br>
hope Tuscon is ready for it."<br>
<br>
Alread=
y SANTON and BUMP could be seen hovering over SILVERBOLT as they<br>
preppe=
d to bring him in as the feeding tubes were retracting from<br>
TUSCON - He=
 could get more once they got him inside.<br>

r>
</p>
